com.xing.api.resources

Class ProfileVisitsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xing.api.Resource
      • com.xing.api.resources.ProfileVisitsResource

  • public class ProfileVisitsResource
extends Resource
    Represents the 'Profile Visits' resource. *

    Provides methods which allow access to a user's profile visits.

    • Method Detail

      • getUsersProfileVisits

        public CallSpec<java.util.List<ProfileVisit>,HttpError> getUsersProfileVisits(java.lang.String userId)
        Returns a list of users who recently visited the specified user’s profile. Entries with null value for the user_id attribute indicate anonymous (non-XING) users (e.g. resulting from Google searches). Any blacklisted users returned will contain null values in the same way as the empty user profile.

        The ProfileVisit.distance() value returned will show only first (value = 1) and second (value = 2) degree contacts. For all other visitors who are XING users the value will be 0. For non-XING users it will be -1.

        If the user is a basic member, only ProfileVisit.photoUrls(), ProfileVisit.visitedAt(), ProfileVisit.reason(), ProfileVisit.visitedAtEncrypted() and ProfileVisit.type() will be available. The remaining fields will be null or -1.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        limit Restricts the number of profile visits to be returned. Must be a positive number. Default: 10
        offset Offset. This must be a positive number. Default: 0.
        shared_contacts Number of shared contacts that should be included in the result. Must be a positive number. Default: 0, Maximum: 10.
        since Only returns visits more recent than the specified time stamp (ISO 8601). ProfileVisit.visitedAtEncrypted() is also accepted and will allow to retrieve all all visits that were more recent than the specified one one.
        strip_html Specifies whether the profile visit reason should be stripped of HTML (true) or not (false). Default value: false. Values other then true/false will be treated as false.
        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the user who's profile visits should be returned.
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.
        See Also:
        'Get profile visit' resource page.

      • getOwnProfileVisits

        public CallSpec<java.util.List<ProfileVisit>,HttpError> getOwnProfileVisits()
        Returns a list of users who recently visited the authorizing user’s profile. Same as getUsersProfileVisits(String).

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        limit Restricts the number of profile visits to be returned. Must be a positive number. Default: 10
        offset Offset. This must be a positive number. Default: 0.
        shared_contacts Number of shared contacts that should be included in the result. Must be a positive number. Default: 0, Maximum: 10.
        since Only returns visits more recent than the specified time stamp (ISO 8601). ProfileVisit.visitedAtEncrypted() is also accepted and will allow to retrieve all all visits that were more recent than the specified one one.
        strip_html Specifies whether the profile visit reason should be stripped of HTML (true) or not (false). Default value: false. Values other then true/false will be treated as false.
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.
        See Also:
        'Get profile visit' resource page.

      • createProfileVisits

        public CallSpec<java.lang.Void,HttpError> createProfileVisits(java.lang.String userId)
        Generate a profile visit.

        The visiting user will be derived from the user executing the call auth headers, and the visit reason derived from the consumer.

        Parameters:
        userId - The user which is visited by the authorizing user.
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.
        See Also:
        'Create profile visit' resource page.
